name: Space Duck (Mandarine Holfgrane)
description:
This is my submission for "Arcadia Jam 6"

Theme = vers l'infinie et au delà !

  • Goal:

You are a plastic duck in space ! You can take booster to have more speed ! 

Be carefull to DeathBooster...

  • Rule/PadGame: 

Use "Left" and "Right arrow" to move the duck. And "Space" to use a turbo BOOST

  • Crédit: 

Music, sound = MPC beats by Me.

Sprites = Affinity Designer by Me.

Code = Love2D (lua) by Me. 

Special Crédit to quack duck :  Duck Quack by SPANAC 13/11/2017 (FreesoundLibrary)
